name: MonkAuthLogin
description: Login to an existing tenant and obtain a JWT authentication token. Use this when you need to authenticate to a tenant that already exists (use MonkAuthRegister for new tenants). Requires tenant name and password, with optional username (defaults to 'root'). The JWT token is cached in memory for the entire Claude Code session and automatically included in all subsequent API calls. Token is valid for 24 hours. Returns tenant name, username, and token expiration time. This is a convenience wrapper around MonkAuth with action='login' for the most common authentication scenario.
